actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Nimbleness
special_abilities.desc: The ratfolk can move through the space of any Medium or larger hostile creature, and such a space isn't difficult terrain for the ratfolk.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The ratfolk has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratfolk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
